group_1.textLeft: Ahh!
She’s awake!
The Ripper Girl assimilated you.
I'm glad you've regained consciousness.

group_1.textRight: ...It seems I've caused you some trouble.@My apologies...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it.
More importantly, I want you to tell me@what happened.

group_1.textRight: ...I don't have much to tell you, but...

group_1.narration: "The reason we were following@the Ripper Girl rumor..."
"...was because we were the ones@who originally started the rumor."
"One month ago,@a Magical Girl appeared in Kamihama@and started killing other Magical Girls...@I started the rumor in hopes of@warning others about her."
"As time went by,@the rumor spread to the outside of the city,@but at the same time,@as typical of rumors,@it became boring and was forgotten."
"However, now the rumors are@once again circulating in Kamihama..."
"We suspected a connection with@the previous Magical Girl@and set out to investigate..."

group_1.textLeft: ...Then you were assimilated.

group_1.textRight: ...and, in all likelihood, the previous Magical Girl@had nothing to do with it.
The rumor going around right now
may have been based on the rumor we spread.
But I feel that they’re fundamentally different@things.

group_1.textLeft: (The first Ripper Girl rumor was spread...)
(As a warning about the Magical Girl killer...)
(The culprit in that series of murders where only@teenage girls were targeted... Could they be...?)
(...That has nothing to do with the present.)
(What we need to do now is...)
(Deal with the Ripper Girl that@manifested in reality...)

group_1.textRight: That’s all the information I’ve gathered.

group_1.textLeft: The original rumor and the current rumor...
Just clarifying the relationship between them@is helpful.
Oh, and we need you to give us a name.

group_1.textRight: Not mine, I presume...@Whose is it?

group_1.textLeft: Dumpling Girl!

group_1.textRight: Matsuri, I don’t think anyone@would understand that...

group_1.textLeft: She’s apparently your teammate.
Natsuki doesn’t seem to know her name,@either.

group_1.textRight: ...Most likely, you’re referring to Meiyui Chun.
She’s the only one missing among the people@you’ve rescued.

group_1.textLeft: It must be Meiyui Chun!@Okay!
Let’s go! Haruka!
Chisato, Nanaka...

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about us, we'll be fine.
Yes, I can at least defend myself.
